## Container class

Provides a simple chainable interface for working with collections of data

Signature:

```typescript
export declare class Container<I = any>
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                       | Modifiers | Description       |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------- |
| [(constructor)(repository)](/api/container/container/constructor) |           | Class constructor |

## Properties

| Property                                          | Modifiers | Type                      | Description                  |
| ------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| [ident?](/api/container/container/ident)          |           | string                    | <i>(Optional)</i> Identifier |
| [repository](/api/container/container/repository) |           | Record&lt;string, any&gt; | The container store          |

## Methods

| Method                                                                            | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [all()](/api/container/container/all)                                             |           | Returns the repository in its entirety as a plain JS object                                                                                                                                                   |
| [count(key)](/api/container/container/count)                                      |           | Return a number indicating the length of a matched key in the repository.If no key is provided, returns the length of the repository.                                                                         |
| [each(key, callFn)](/api/container/container/each)                                |           | Use each value as parameters in a supplied callback                                                                                                                                                           |
| [every(fn)](/api/container/container/every)                                       |           | Calls a supplied function for every repository value, passing the item's key and value as callback parameters.                                                                                                |
| [fromEntries(entries)](/api/container/container/fromentries)                      |           | Merges object created from an array of tuples with the repository.                                                                                                                                            |
| [get(key)](/api/container/container/get)                                          |           | Returns a value from the the repository.                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [getEntries(key)](/api/container/container/getentries)                            |           | Returns a repository key and value as a tuple                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [getKeys(key)](/api/container/container/getkeys)                                  |           | Returns an array of values of the enumerable keys of a repository object                                                                                                                                      |
| [getMap(key)](/api/container/container/getmap)                                    |           | Get a repository item as a .                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [getValues(key)](/api/container/container/getvalues)                              |           | Returns an array of values of the enumerable properties of a repository object                                                                                                                                |
| [has(key)](/api/container/container/has)                                          |           | Return a boolean indicating if a given key exists.                                                                                                                                                            |
| [is(key, value)](/api/container/container/is)                                     |           | Return a boolean indicating if the given key matches the given value.                                                                                                                                         |
| [isArray(key)](/api/container/container/isarray)                                  |           | Return true if object is an array.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [isDefined(key)](/api/container/container/isdefined)                              |           | Return true if object is defined.                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [isEmpty(key)](/api/container/container/isempty)                                  |           | Checks if value is empty. A value is considered empty unless it’s an arguments object, array, string, or jQuery-like collection with a length greater than 0 or an object with own enumerable properties.     |
| [isFalse(key)](/api/container/container/isfalse)                                  |           | Return a boolean indicating if the given key's value is false                                                                                                                                                 |
| [isFunction(key)](/api/container/container/isfunction)                            |           | Return true if object is a function                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [isInstanceOf(key, instance)](/api/container/container/isinstanceof)              |           | Return true if object is an instance of a class.                                                                                                                                                              |
| [isInstanceOfAny(key, instances)](/api/container/container/isinstanceofany)       |           | Return true if object is an instance of any of the classes.                                                                                                                                                   |
| [isNotArray(key)](/api/container/container/isnotarray)                            |           | Return true if object is not an array.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [isNotEmpty(key)](/api/container/container/isnotempty)                            |           | Checks if value is not empty. A value is considered empty unless it’s an arguments object, array, string, or jQuery-like collection with a length greater than 0 or an object with own enumerable properties. |
| [isNotFunction(key)](/api/container/container/isnotfunction)                      |           | Return true if object is not a function                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [isNotInstanceOf(key, instance)](/api/container/container/isnotinstanceof)        |           | Return true if object is not an instance of a class.                                                                                                                                                          |
| [isNotInstanceOfAny(key, instances)](/api/container/container/isnotinstanceofany) |           | Return true if object is not an instance of any of the classes.                                                                                                                                               |
| [isNotNull(key)](/api/container/container/isnotnull)                              |           | Return true if object is not null.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [isNotNumber(key)](/api/container/container/isnotnumber)                          |           | Return true if object is not a number.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [isNotString(key)](/api/container/container/isnotstring)                          |           | Return true if object is not a string.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [isNull(key)](/api/container/container/isnull)                                    |           | Return true if object is null.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [isNumber(key)](/api/container/container/isnumber)                                |           | Return true if object is a number.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [isString(key)](/api/container/container/isstring)                                |           | Return true if object is a string.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [isTrue(key)](/api/container/container/istrue)                                    |           | Return a boolean indicating if the given key's value is true                                                                                                                                                  |
| [isUndefined(key)](/api/container/container/isundefined)                          |           | Return true if object is not defined.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [merge(key, value)](/api/container/container/merge)                               |           | Merge a supplied value with an existing repository value                                                                                                                                                      |
| [mergeStore(values)](/api/container/container/mergestore)                         |           | Merge values onto the container store.                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [mutate(key, mutationFn)](/api/container/container/mutate)                        |           | Mutate a repository item                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [mutateStore(mutationFn)](/api/container/container/mutatestore)                   |           | Runs the entire repository through the supplied fn and returns the transformed value. The transformed repository replaces the original.                                                                       |
| [remove(key)](/api/container/container/remove)                                    |           | deleteDelete an entry from the repository                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [set(key, value)](/api/container/container/set)                                   |           | Set a repository value                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [setStore(repository)](/api/container/container/setstore)                         |           | Replace the store with an all new set of values                                                                                                                                                               |
| [transform(key, mutationFn)](/api/container/container/transform)                  |           | Retrieve a container item, running it through the supplied fn.                                                                                                                                                |
| [transformStore(transformFn)](/api/container/container/transformstore)            |           | Runs the entire repository through the supplied fn and returns the transformed value.                                                                                                                         |
| [unique(key)](/api/container/container/unique)                                    |           | Returns unique elements of an array item                                                                                                                                                                      |
